basics.name: Hossain Khan
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary: Senior Software Engineer with over 15 years of experience, passionate about crafting intuitive interfaces that connect people through technology. Currently at Slack, enhancing the Android app with a focus on platform improvements like BlockKit, Workflows, and Slack Apps. Career began as a web developer and evolved into mobile technologies, thriving on tackling challenging projects and building innovative solutions.

projects.name: Android TRMNL Display Mirror
projects.description: Mirrors existing TRMNL device display image onto your Android device. A simple Android app that connects to the TRMNL/BYOS API to fetch the current screen image and shows it on your device.

projects.name: KGeoTimeline

references.name: Zac Sweers
references.reference: Endlessly impressed with the work Hossain has done in the Slack Android repo to improve our docsite and make contributing easy. Even down to setting up an auto-approving bot for any PR that _only_ updates docs.

references.name: Garvan Keeley
references.reference: I had the privilege of working with Hossain for 3 years at Slack on a team focused on developing the next generation of Slack's Platform. Hossain brings technical expertise, creativity, and contagious positivity to every project. His proactive approach inspires others to step out of their comfort zones and tackle project challenges.

references.name: Doug Doe
references.reference: Hossain is a hard-working Android developer capable of taking on large development tasks. He collaborates extremely well with other developers on tasks and features. He is adaptable to different challenges and soaks up changing priorities without flinching.

references.name: Sebastian Jakubowski
references.reference: I had the pleasure of working with Hossain on multiple projects at QuickPlay. Hossain is an experienced and creative developer, a person you can trust when you want to be sure that important tasks are completed in a systematic and precise way. We call the few top engineers at QuickPlay 'superstars', and Hossain is one of them.
